title: 2005 • Eqbal Ahmad Lecture • Noam Chomsky • Hampshire College
description:
Noam Chomsky spoke to an overflow audience at the annual Eqbal Ahmad Lecture at Hampshire College on October 11, 2005. His lecture, titled "Democracy Promotion, Past and Present: Rhetoric and Reality,"

The Eqbal Ahmad Lecture series was founded to honor the late teacher for whom it is named. Ahmad was a longtime professor at Hampshire College, and this lecture series was built to be a continuing celebration of his life and work.

You can find a playlist of all Eqbal Lectures here: http://tinyurl.com/EqbalPlaylist
